Subject: SSO configuration failed
Description:
We have configured the SSO settings in Endpoint Protector Dashboard, however when clicked on "Test", I got logged out of the portal and got an error "SSO is not configured properly". Now I am not able to login to the dashboard to revert the config or obtain the Failover URL. Please help with below : 

Login to Dashboard, by reverting the settings or obtaining the Failover URL.
Configure SSO with Azure correctly.
What_We_Know__c: Customer configured the SSO settings in Endpoint Protector Dashboard and when they clicked on "Test", they got logged out of the portal and got an error "SSO is not configured properly". They were not able to login to the dashboard to revert the config or obtain the Failover URL.
Next_Steps__c:
We had a remote session in which we removed the SSO configuration via the backend. Customer was able to log into the EPP Server and set up the SSO configuration again, this time also noting down the failover URL.

This case was resolved in remote session.  Case can be closed.
Solution_Comment__c:
We had a remote session in which we removed the SSO configuration via the backend. Customer was able to log into the EPP Server and set up the SSO configuration again, this time also noting down the failover URL.
